00106         static QString getExistingDirectoryPath(const QString & szDir = QString(), const QString & szCaption = QString(), QWidget * pParent = 0)
00107         {
00108 #ifdef COMPILE_KDE_SUPPORT
00109                 // QFileDialog allows making new directories...kfiledialog not :/
00110                 return KFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(KUrl(szDir),pParent,szCaption);
00111                 //return getExistingDirectory(dir,parent,caption);
00112 #else // COMPILE_KDE_SUPPORT
00113                 return getExistingDirectory(pParent,szCaption,szDir);
00114 #endif // COMPILE_KDE_SUPPORT
00115         };
